title: Massive Disconnect
body: I recently jump into 2 rank games, both in which my entire team and I dced. I managed to win one of those games with 4 dc in a 25min game.  And the other I lost without a lost prevented. I'm not here to argue about my lost elo, but Is there a problem with the purple side team? Both games I was in the purple side, and both game "MY" entire team dced.

replies.body: I looked over your last time games and was unable to see any disconnections from players, with an exception to one that resulted in a /remake as leaver.  If you are still experiencing issues, it's likely that your network is having trouble staying connected so it can't communicate what's going on between you and others during the match.  I suggest going over our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help get that fixed up.  Best of luck!

I don't know how do you check if a player was every disconnected at one point in a game, but from my point of view I can say the following.
1) It wasn't just me who was just disconnect, my entire team as well. The enemy team was perfectly fine. 
2) We did all reconnected right after we were disconnect, only to find out that we all died.
3) Also yes, there was one point where there was indeed a remake. That was me, everyone was 100% on my loading screen, but the game didn't start.
